amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Navy AIM-120D missile procurement by $23.8M to help meet Indo-PACOM required critical capabilities while reducing Defense-Wide Operation and Maintenance account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 115-785 to increase funding for Navy AIM-120D missile procurement by $23.8M to help meet Indo-PACOM required critical capabilities and match the House-passed authorization in the FY 2019 NDAA, while reducing defense-wide operation and maintenance by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gallagher amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 116 - 296 (Roll no. 307).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Gallagher.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gallagher amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 116 - 296 (Roll no. 307).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
